Festive Beervolts

20 Dec 2001

Here's your handy cut out and take to the pub guide to beervolts happening over the holidays. Some will be celebrating Christmas, some Hannukah, some just the existence of beer, and some will be entirely non-alcoholic. Maybe.

Here's the space anyway. If you have a beervolt, add it in a comment below
